summary: Predict classification or regression values using ML
description: Applies a machine learning model to a data cube of input features and predicts output values or classes for it.

parameters.name: data
parameters.description: The data cube containing the input features.

parameters.name: model
parameters.description: A ML model that was trained with one of the ML training processes such as ``fit_class_random_forest()``.

parameters.name: dimension
parameters.description: The name of the dimension that the model applies to. Fails with a `DimensionNotAvailable` exception if the specified dimension does not exist.

returns.description: The data cube with the predicted values. It removes the specified dimension.

DimensionNotAvailable.message: A dimension with the specified name does not exist.
